engines.yarn: DO NOT USE YARN - Use npm only! Yarn breaks FiveM loading screens!

scripts.preinstall:
node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') !== -1) throw new Error('

❌ YARN IS NOT ALLOWED!

⚠️  This FiveM loading screen requires npm.
⚠️  Yarn does not work with FiveM!

✅ Use: npm install

')"
